column1: '''''Mythlore'' 35''' (Volume 10, Issue 1) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
*"Celtic Elements in Charles Williams, Tolkien, and C.S. Lewis"
*"The Figure of Tolkien and the Art of Creative Fantasy"
*"The Legacy of Iolo Morganneg and Hersard de le Villemarque"
